bellevue.meetingHighlights: Numerous weekday lunchtime and evening meetings serving Eastside commuters; several newcomer-friendly groups.
bellevue.transitInfo: King County Metro and express routes to Seattle; light rail access nearby via regional Link extensions.

bellingham.neighborhoods: Fairhaven, Lettered Streets, South Hill, Sehome
bellingham.meetingHighlights: Active university-area meetings and evening speaker meetings; strong outdoor meeting tradition in summer.
bellingham.transitInfo: Whatcom Transit provides regional bus service; most meetings are drive- or transit-accessible within city limits.

everett.meetingHighlights: Evening and noon meetings with a mix of open and closed formats; convenient meeting options for military and shipyard workers.
everett.transitInfo: Community Transit and Sound Transit express routes; easy drive to I-5 and regional park-and-ride lots.

seattle.neighborhoods: Downtown, Capitol Hill, Fremont, Ballard, Belltown, Queen Anne
seattle.meetingHighlights: Extensive meeting listings citywide including speaker nights, meditation meetings, and bilingual groups; strong newcomer outreach.
seattle.transitInfo: King County Metro buses, Link light rail, streetcar, ferries and Amtrak connections; many meetings are transit-friendly.

spokane.neighborhoods: Downtown, Browne's Addition, North Hill, South Hill
spokane.meetingHighlights: Robust local fellowship with daily meetings and a variety of formats; strong central downtown meeting cluster.
spokane.transitInfo: Spokane Transit Authority provides bus service; Amtrak service and regional flights at Spokane International Airport.

tacoma.meetingHighlights: Evening and lunchtime meetings near downtown and the university; strong community-based groups.
tacoma.transitInfo: Sound Transit and Pierce Transit services; Tacoma Link streetcar and good I-5 access.

vancouver.neighborhoods: Downtown, Fisher's Landing, Felida, Vancouver Heights
vancouver.meetingHighlights: Diverse meeting options including evening and family-friendly groups; crossover attendance from Portland.
vancouver.transitInfo: C-Tran regional buses and express connections to Portland; drive access across I-5 and I-205 bridges.

olympia.meetingHighlights: Small but steady meetings including lunchtime groups for state employees and evening formats.
olympia.transitInfo: Intercity Transit provides local and regional bus service; most attendees drive from surrounding towns.
